attributes.action: Petition to call for a vote of no confidence in Rotherham council
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to call for a vote of no confidence in Rotherham metropolitan borough council.

Their covering up of child sexual exploitation is beyond reproach. For years the total disrespect and disregard they have shown towards the people of this once great town has grown but they have not just over stepped the mark they have committed crimes. It's time they paid for their crimes and were brought to justice.

The people of this town have no confidence in their actions no longer
